extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    Level 3 in an ENSC or ENVS Plan, or permission of the School.

basic.description: This course will provide intensive coverage of a topic that is current and/or of special interest in Environmental Studies. The course will cover mainly social science-based material, but will be multidisciplinary. Offered periodically by visiting professors or members of faculty. Topic for each year will be announced in advance of course selection and will be made available on the ENSC webpage. Students are advised to consult with their academic counsellor and/or the course instructor prior to registration.
basic.subject: ENSC
basic.title: Special Topics in Environmental Studies II
